title: Every Saint Had a Past, Every Sinner Has a Future
itunes:title: Every Saint Had a Past, Every Sinner Has a Future
description: This week's scriptures present the hope of moving forward. All of us have sins and vices in our past. Christ offers us the possibility for forgiveness and a bright future in grace no matter how sinful our pasts are.
content:encoded: This week's scriptures present the hope of moving forward. All of us have sins and vices in our past. Christ offers us the possibility for forgiveness and a bright future in grace no matter how sinful our pasts are.
itunes:subtitle: This week's scriptures present the hope of moving forward. All of us have sins and vices in our past. Christ offers us the possibility for forgiveness and a bright future in grace no matter how sinful our pasts are.

itunes:author: Bishop Robert Barron
